step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap, maintaining an upright posture.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Focus on keeping your head upright and avoiding any forward pull.
Holding steady! Remember to maintain that upright head position throughout the hold.
Smooth return to the starting position. Ensure your wrists stay aligned as you reverse the motion.
Second rep starting well. Continue to keep hands clasped and posture tall.
Good movement towards the forehead. Focus on bringing your elbows in slightly closer as you lift.
Excellent spread of the elbows behind your head. Keep your head lifted and avoid pulling forward.
Holding the stretch. Maintain good form with your head upright.
Great job returning to the start. Ensure your wrists stay aligned throughout the reverse motion.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when raising hands and spread them wide behind your head. Maintain an upright head and avoid pulling forward for best results.
